original_title: Кто ты, кто я. С научной точки зрения
overview: He got to Kyiv from Luhansk through the Crimea. He came to us because he just had to live somewhere. Then he moved, because we could no longer be close, we could not find a common language. We are different - but have we really tried to understand each other?
title: Who You Are. Who Am I. From a Scientific Point of View
